name: Joyfire Riot
description:
Fiery jetpacks! Villains and skulls! What a crush game!

Download now for android, play game and join the adventure. Enter the year 2022 with the new funny latest action arcade game!

Jump from the helicopter to the building and defeat all your enemies with your jetpack. Defeat the most enemies and challenge your friends to top the global leaderboards. 

FETURES:

🔥 Enjoy the fun with simple and adjustable controls.

🔥 Make the highest score and rise above your friends in the global ranking.

🔥 Complete all missions and test your reflexes.

🔥 Defeat the most enemies before you run out of fuel.

GAME CONTROLS

🎮 Move right and left easily with Right and Left buttons.

🎮 Press the Up button to fire your jetpack and fly above the enemies.

🎮 All of the buttons are adjustable, position the buttons there if you can play comfortably.

TIPS

🧠 Don't waste a lot of fuel while flying over enemies.

🧠 Bombs give you faster and more points.

The nice comments you will give on Google Play and the good comments you will write are very important for the development of the game.
